mapper.select: SELECT recnum, lvl, articleNO, commentNO, parentNO, comment_text, comment_id, comment_rate FROM ( SELECT rownum AS recnum, lvl, articleNO, commentNO, parentNO, comment_text, comment_id, comment_rate FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS lvl, articleNO, commentNO, parentNO, comment_text, comment_id, comment_rate FROM COMMENT_1 START WITH parentNO=0 CONNECT BY NOCYCLE PRIOR commentNO = parentNO ORDER SIBLINGS BY commentNO DESC)) WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} and recnum BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100+#{pageNum}*10
